tool_description: If you are provided with some biochemistry jargons or scientific terminologies, use this tool first. This tool allows users to search Wikipedia for articles based on a given query and returns a specified number of relevant results.

required_parameters.name: query
required_parameters.description: The keywords that will be searched using Wikipedia.

optional_parameters.name: max_items
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve from Wikipedia. The default value is 3, meaning the top 3 relevant search results will be returned.

return_values.name: search_results
return_values.description: A list of search results, each containing the article title, a brief summary of the article, and the corresponding Wikipedia URL.
